Azureblade: Do not worry... We will find a way to bring him back. 
Decepticons are decepticons, so I think Megatron was effectively 
lying. He must have twisted the poor spark of your friend to befit his 
dark schemes. I will help you find a way. Can you tell me when you 
find an operating stasis pod with a viable protoform inside? Also, I 
think it is time to tell Prowl.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Alphah::
> 
> Alphah's spark laughted "Alive could be, but by now you aren't 
> stronger... not in my body... I'm weak as you see..."and sadly 
> added "I don't know how can I help my friend Condor, who now is the 
> decepticon Nightstrike... I can't belive that he joined then 
> gradly... Megatron is lying..."
>

hostile...
